abilities.name: Heroic Leader
abilities.description: Once per turning point, you can: use a firefight ploy for 0CP (if specified operative), use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy for CP when activating a friendly operative (if not in enemy control range and not already used), or use Adjust Doctrine firefight ploy for 0CP (if not in enemy control range).

abilities.name: Iron Halo
abilities.description: Once per battle, when an attack dice inflicts Normal Dmg on this operative, you can ignore that damage.

abilities.name: Chapter Veteran
abilities.description: If selected for deployment, select one additional CHAPTER TACTIC for this operative for the battle.

abilities.name: Doctrine Warfare (Assault/Tactical)
abilities.description: Once per battle, when using Combat Doctrine strategy ploy to select Assault or Tactical, if this operative is in the killzone, it costs 0CP.

abilities.name: Doctrine Warfare (Devastator/Tactical)
abilities.description: Once per battle, when using Combat Doctrine strategy ploy to select Devastator or Tactical, if this operative is in the killzone, it costs 0CP.

abilities.name: Grenadier
abilities.description: This operative can use frag and krak grenades without counting towards limited uses. Improve the Hit stat by 1 when doing so.

abilities.name: Camo Cloak
abilities.description: Ignore the Saturate weapon rule when being shot. Has the Stealthy Chapter Tactic; if that tactic was already selected, retain two cover saves (one normal, one critical).

unique_actions.name: Optics
unique_actions.description: Until the start of the next activation, enemy operatives cannot be obscured from this operative's shooting. Cannot perform within enemy control range.

ploys.name: Combat Doctrine
ploys.description: Select Assault, Devastator, or Tactical doctrine. Friendly operatives gain benefits based on the selected doctrine: Assault (gain 1" Movement and 1" Charge), Devastator (improve Ballistic Skill by 1), or Tactical (can re-roll one attack die when shooting or fighting).

ploys.name: Transhuman Physiology
ploys.description: Use this ploy when a friendly operative is targeted by an attack. Until the end of that combat, treat your Save characteristic as one better (e.g., 3+ becomes 2+, minimum of 2+).

ploys.name: Honour the Chapter
ploys.description: Select one friendly operative that has been activated this Turning Point. That operative can immediately perform a free Dash or Charge action (1AP action becomes free).

ploys.name: Righteous Fury
ploys.description: Use when a friendly operative fights in combat. For that combat, improve the Critical Hit stat of that operative's melee weapons by 1.

selection_limits.exception: Warrior operatives can be taken multiple times

fireTeamRules: Can include up to 5 non-leader operatives
Each unique operative (except Warriors) can only be taken once
Intercessor Warriors can be taken multiple times
